Nightlight:
 Nighlgiht left the base and flew a way. When she landed and l=
et her signature appear, she hoped that Dark Rodimus could track her 
 To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2011 2=
3:08:16 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned - Rodimus










      =
  












Tucson's reply comes back to Nightlight but in a rather mean=
ingful way.
" Master Yokitron always told me to have a great respect for fa=
te and where it takes your companions and yourself." I respect your wishes =
and I will see that Elita is safe and that no hand will ever come to harm h=
er. But most of all, be careful and best of luck following the road that fa=
te has shown you as it shows everyone when destiny calls you forth."

Perpe=
tually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 31, 2011, at 11:00 PM, Airs=
hadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
     =
 
      


Nightlight:
 
Nightlight smiled and took the quills, she did a l=
arge look at ELita and quickly left. While she walks owards the Exit. While=
 she was reaching the exit nighlight typed a highly encoded message at Tucs=
on "I'm looking for Rodimus... Take care of elita, and trust in what I'll d=
o"
 
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Wed, 31 =
Aug 2011 22:38:41 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










     =
   












Straight Shot smiles as she listens to Nightlight.  She the=
n plucks a few quills from her armor and gives them to her.
" Ya might need=
 these, they go in but they don't come out that way.  Just on case things g=
o south.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 31, 2011, at=
 10:29 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



  =
  
      
      

      




 nighlight:
 
Nightlight smiled and said  whil=
e she glenty touched elita"It's what i needed to know, please stay with her=
... i would ask Nightshift care her if he was here"
 
"What's happening mom=
?"said Elite with yawn
 
"all will be all right, my dear"said Nighlight"sle=
ep"
 Elita felt sleep once more, Nightlight kissed her and she stood up and=
 slowly left the room To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...=
m
Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2011 21:36:38 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.=











        












Straight Shot carries a worried expression =
on her face as she looks down to Elita, gently stroking her fur with a tend=
er hand.
" She's in very good hands Nightlight.  Of course I'll be sure she=
 has someone ta take good care of her.  And you should see how Tucson inter=
acts with her.  Once he holds her, he's not about ta put her down too fast.=
  And despite his temper, he's a real softy when it comes ta being around y=
oungsters Elita's age.  I know what he's gonna do if he and Talon have ta a=
dopt Elita, he's gonna spoil her rotten.  All dads wanna spoil their kids, =
especially if they consider them " Daddy's little girl."
"Look at me, I wan=
na do the same thing, I just wanna hold her and never let go.   And if anyo=
ne is gonna make phenomenal parents it's Talon and Tucson.  I know how much=
 it would mean ta both of them ta have a young bot look up to them and depe=
nd on them for guidance and protection, because that's what parents do and =
I know a great pair of parents when I see them."
She smiles to Talon as she=
 makes her last statement.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
O=
n Aug 31, 2011, at 8:16 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wro=
te:






 



    
      
      
      



nightlight:
 
"I have things to=
 do"said the femme"and I need to be sure that Elita will be ok, he wants us=
 then I plan to find him before he comes... dont ask me more; less you know=
, and elita will be safer "
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@=
yahoo.com
Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2011 09:46:56 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be =
Learned.










        












Straight Shot falls off her seat wi=
th her mouth wide open.
" Yeah, what Talon said, what're ya saying?  Nightl=
ight, things will be okay I'm sure they will."

Perpetually on the move and=
 constantly busy. 
On Aug 31, 2011, at 12:21 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly=
2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      




 Talom/Ni=
ghtlight:
 
Nighlight looked at Talon and Straightshot and Talon said "That=
's true... We belive that is that or something is controlling him... "
 
Ni=
ghtlight said almost in low voice "If something happens me, will you and Tu=
cson care Elita?"
 
Talon looked surpriced at Nightlight and said "What are=
 you saying?"
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: =
Tue, 30 Aug 2011 22:53:48 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.







=



        












Straight Shot enters the room with Talon and is car=
eful not to wake Elita.  She smiles while looking to Nightlight and the cub=
.
" I can just see it now, all of us together, watching the young bots deve=
lop Their skills together..  Elita would really love ta have someone ta pal=
 around with.  I bet in the near future that will happen.  And Nightlight, =
don't worry, Ticson is out there looking for Wheelie and I bet he'll find R=
odimus too.  I got ta thinking about things and I realized that the shell p=
rogram was long since gone a while ago.   I bet that Dark Rodimus is a copy=
 of the real Rodimus.  And if they're out there, Tucson will find them.  Is=
n't that right, Talon?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On A=
ug 30, 2011, at 8:18 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:=







 



    
      
      
      



Nightlight/Elita:
 
Talon smiled a=
nd glenty hit the door and feminine voice said "Come in"
 
Nightlight was s=
at down in one bed when Talon came in, and elita was deeply sleep. 
 
Talon=
 came in and sat down close to Nighlight whose was looking at the floor.
 
=
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Tue, 30 Aug 20=
11 08:29:31 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        


=










Straight Shot transforms into her robot mode and follows Talon to=
 Nightlight's quarters.  She was happy to know that her suggestion was actu=
ally considered by Leo Prime, about getting the femme bots together as a te=
am.
" I really didn't think Leo would go for my idea of letting the femme b=
ots work as a team.  He sure surprised me."

Perpetually on the move and co=
nstantly busy. 
On Aug 30, 2011, at 12:46 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly200=
2@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



Talon:
 
"Let=
's go then "saind the female while she walked towards Nighlgiht's quaters  =

 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Mon, 29 Aug =
2011 23:53:26 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        
=












Straight Shot nods. 
" Sure.  Let's go.  She'll be happy ta kno=
w that Master Nightshift is accepting her and Elita as his students."

Perp=
etually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 11:38 PM, Air=
shadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
    =
  
      



Talon:
 
Looking at straight shot "Do you want to come with me=
 and pay a visit at Nightlight?"
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicqu=
artz@...
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 23:31:54 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons t=
o be Learned.










        












Nightshift nods as he gets Tal=
on's transmission.
" No problem, I'm flexible."
Perpetually on the move and=
 constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 11:03 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly=
2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



Talon:
 
"=
I think that Elita is too young to train outside the ark"said Talon
 
To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 19=
:24:03 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        







=





Nightshift thinks for a moment. If anything, Tucson would rely on grou=
nd tracking to find Wheelie.  
" Most likely his field track'n tactics.  Th=
at means he's gonna land at the area and attempt ta follow Wheelie on foot.=
  He knows how ta identify a bot just by foot and tire tracks alone. One mo=
re thing, he's got sharp senses and he was promised he'd be able ta go it a=
lone.  Get downwind of him and he won't be too happy.  Even I know better t=
hen ta mess with him."


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On A=
ug 29, 2011, at 6:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:


=




 



    
      
      
      > <OLD>

>

> Nightshift nods to Leo's re=
quest.

>

> " School will have ta open a little later than expected.  Okay=
 Leo, I'm on

> it."

>

> He transforms into SUV mode and rolls off toward=
 Polar Claw.

>

> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna make sure Tucson doesn't see y=
a!  He gets wind

> that you didn't let em do that mission on his own, he's=
 gonna see that as an

> act of distrust.  Then he's really gonna be in a b=
ad mood.  Trust me, I

> know.  Ratchet was the same way.  Like dad like so=
n."



<NEW>



"I know." LEO PRIME said over the radio "But sometimes thin=
gs are far

more important than his anger."



When NIGHTSHIFT arrived at P=
OLAR CLAW's location he was already

standing with RAMULUS and the group's =
tactical expert PROWL, they were

all in robot mode standing at the shuttle=
.



WOLFGANG was standing off to the side manipulating something. "Its

fu=
eled up and ready to go." WLFGANG said as he stowed an energon

dispensing =
unit in its holster.



"Good!" POLAR CLAW said. he was easily the largest =
of the group. While

not as tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still br=
oad and massive,

giving he appearance of great size and ferocity.



POLAR=
 CLAW turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here because you know

Tuscon b=
etter than we." There was a dismissive grunt as he glanced at

a PADD he ha=
d in his hand, it is ohviously the notes and mission

parameters he recieve=
d from LEO PRIME.



"He's gone out alone. Sensors showed that he was going=
 off in the

direction of that jungle where Rodimus is suppose to be." Ther=
e was

another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same direction Wheelie took as

=
well."



POLAR CLAW lowered his padd as he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every sc=
an we

have of that place shows it is a dense jungle, his inhanced senses

=
will not help him much there. What tactic do you think he will use to

loca=
te Wheelie?"



(TAG)



Preston

><br>
> Nightshift nods to Leo's req=
uest.<br>
><br>
> " School will have ta open a little later than expe=
cted.  Okay Leo, I'm on<br>
> it."<br>
><br>
> He transforms into =
SUV mode and rolls off toward Polar Claw.<br>
><br>
> " Hey Leo, ya m=
ight wanna make sure Tucson doesn't see ya!  He gets wind<br>
> that you=
 didn't let em do that mission on his own, he's gonna see that as an<br>
&g=
t; act of distrust.  Then he's really gonna be in a bad mood.  Trust me, I<=
br>
> know.  Ratchet was the same way.  Like dad like son."<br>
<br>
&lt=
;NEW><br>
<br>
"I know." LEO PRIME said over the radio "But sometimes th=
ings are far<br>
more important than his anger."<br>
<br>
When NIGHTSHIFT a=
rrived at POLAR CLAW's location he was already<br>
standing with RAMULUS an=
d the group's tactical expert PROWL, they were<br>
all in robot mode standi=
ng at the shuttle.<br>
<br>
WOLFGANG was standing off to the side manipulat=
ing something. "Its<br>
fueled up and ready to go." WLFGANG said as he stow=
ed an energon<br>
dispensing unit in its holster.<br>
<br>
"Good!" POLAR CL=
AW said. he was easily the largest of the group. While<br>
not as tall as R=
ODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still broad and massive,<br>
giving he appear=
ance of great size and ferocity.<br>
<br>
POLAR CLAW turned to look at NIGH=
TSHIFT, "You're here because you know<br>
Tuscon better than we." There was=
 a dismissive grunt as he glanced at<br>
a PADD he had in his hand, it is o=
hviously the notes and mission<br>
parameters he recieved from LEO PRIME.<b=
r>
<br>
"He's gone out alone. Sensors showed that he was going off in the<b=
r>
direction of that jungle where Rodimus is suppose to be." There was<br>
=
another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same direction Wheelie took as<br>
well=
."<br>
<br>
POLAR CLAW lowered his padd as he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every =
scan we<br>
have of that place shows it is a dense jungle, his inhanced sen=
ses<br>
will not help him much there. What tactic do you think he will use =
to<br>
locate Wheelie?"<br>
